title: Dante and the Target
description: Tall, dark, gorgeous and dangerous.She had to give it to the universe, her killer was hot.Michelle Sanders lived a mundane life after the death of her husband five years ago. She stayed away from people, lived in constant paranoia and never went searching for trouble.But trouble came looking for her in the form of a man who watched her every day for a month in the diner she worked as a waitress.Intrigued by the dangerous aura that surrounds his gruff and broody exterior and the fact that he was the only man to affect her after Paul's death, she asked him out on a date.Wrong move.She was a unique woman, that one.Dante is a Ghost Assassin who carries out missions for his Order without question. Then he is asked to observe and terminate the intriguing widow.Where people cowered at the imposing and brooding sight of him, she approached him and asked him out on a date. She had the nerve to make him smile too!He is not one to let his target live. And he makes no exception. Even for the intriguing widow.So he carries out his order.But everything goes terribly wrong.
author: T.J. Ray
